mapper.select: SELECT reservation.ReservationCount, customer.CustomerName, roomtype.RoomType, room.RoomNumber, reservation.ReservationStartDate, reservation.ReservationFinishDate, reservationedit.editstate FROM reservation, room, roomType, customer, reservationedit WHERE reservation.RoomCount = room.roomCount AND room.RoomTypeCount = roomType.RoomTypeCount AND customer.CustomerCount = reservation.CustomerCount AND reservation.EditCode = reservationedit.EditCode
